This is a model year 2024 Evolv100. It is a DEMO ski - it has been used at on-snow demos. It comes with Tyrolia Attack2 14 demo bindings and brakes. There is no warranty on this item.

------

The ideal shape and powerful construction to take on bigger mountains and more snow, the Evolv 100, with integrated VMT 3.0® technology, positions itself perfectly for the adventurous, all-terrain skier. Whether looking for fresh snow, a little tree skiing, or laying down beautiful arcs on groomers, the Evolv 100 has you covered.

CORE PROFILE

VMT 3.0® takes our successful vertical metal core technology two steps further by adding two additional aluminum alloy struts on either side of the center strut. This creates a precise, quiet ride, that is light and nimble in difficult conditions.
Learn about VMT® Cores >

 
ROCKER PROFILE

Hammer Rocker comes armed with an early-rise tip and camber back to the tail for powerful edge grip and precise turn shape.
Explore Rocker Profiles >


Effective Turning Edge: 85%
Tip Rocker: 15%

MOUNTING GUIDE

The “Recommended” mount mark will align you in the center of sidecut and camber of the ski. This allows for the best turn initiation and control in most situations. All mount position measurements are taken from the tail along the surface of the ski.

This is a model year 2025 Helix 89W. It is a DEMO ski - it has been used at on-snow demos. It comes with Tyrolia Attack2 11 demo bindings and brakes. There is no warranty on this item.

–

An all new ski enters the Helix family in a women-specific version.  We updated the tip and tail rocker so the ski butters with ease and will now ski the whole mountain much more capably.  Bamboo, poplar, and carbon fiber construction keep this ski lively and ready to rip any jump line.  The W means ‘wow.’

We hear you - just a simple logo or wordmark tee. No problem. This 100% cotton unisex is an instant classic and will help you land the more structured look you know you want. It sits nicely, maintains sharp lines around the edges, and goes perfectly with layered streetwear outfits. Plus, it's extra trendy now that you own one!

• 100% cotton
• Fabric weight: 5.0–5.3 oz/yd² (170-180 g/m²)
• Open-end yarn
• Tubular fabric
• Taped neck and shoulders
• Double seam at sleeves and bottom hem
• Blank product sourced from Honduras, Nicaragua, Haiti, Dominican Republic, Bangladesh, Mexico, and are printed here in the USA.

Green","Azalea"]},{"name":"Size","position":2,"values":["S","M","L","XL","2XL"]}]},{"id":7274989355063,"title":"Liberty Skis Logo Tee (Black Liberty)","handle":"liberty-skis-logo-tee","body_html":"

We hear you - just a simple logo or wordmark tee. No problem. This 100% cotton unisex is an instant classic and will help you land the more structured look you know you want. It sits nicely, maintains sharp lines around the edges, and goes perfectly with layered streetwear outfits. Plus, it's extra trendy now that you own one!

• 100% cotton
• Sport Grey is 90% cotton, 10% polyester
• Ash Grey is 99% cotton, 1% polyester
• Fabric weight: 5.0–5.3 oz/yd² (170-180 g/m²)
• Open-end yarn
• Tubular fabric
• Taped neck and shoulders
• Double seam at sleeves and bottom hem
• Blank product sourced from Honduras, Nicaragua, Haiti, Dominican Republic, Bangladesh, Mexico, and are printed here in the USA.

Disclaimers: 
• Due to the fabric properties, the White color variant may appear off-white rather than bright white.

This is a model year 2024 Evolv84. It is a DEMO ski - it has been used at on-snow demos. It comes with Tyrolia Attack2 13 demo bindings and brakes. There is no warranty on this item.

------

The Evolv 84 features a flat tail helping finish turns with authority, while the more compliant tip leads the skier into turns easily. Quick and powerful thanks to VMT 3.0® construction, the Evolv 84 is the right ski for skiers who want frontside performance with the ability to mix things up in variable terrain.

CORE PROFILE

VMT 3.0® takes our successful vertical metal core technology two steps further by adding two additional aluminum alloy struts on either side of the center strut. This creates a precise, quiet ride, that is light and nimble in difficult conditions.
Learn about VMT® Cores >

 
ROCKER PROFILE

Hammer Rocker comes armed with an early-rise tip and camber back to the tail for powerful edge grip and precise turn shape.
Explore Rocker Profiles >


Effective Turning Edge: 85%
Tip Rocker: 15%

(cm)","position":1,"values":["165","172","179"]}]},{"id":7272205451319,"title":"Liberty Skis Unisex Hoodie (Embroidered)","handle":"liberty-skis-unisex-hoodie-embroidered","body_html":"

Liberty knows you can't bring your skis to the office or school, so how are you going to represent?  This embroidered Liberty logo hoodie is the way, my friend.  Everyone needs a cozy go-to hoodie like this one.  Coworkers and friends will know you splashed out as well, with the raised embroidery on this bad boy.

Details:
• 50% pre-shrunk cotton, 50% polyester
Heather Sport Dark Navy is 40% cotton, 60% polyester
• Fabric weight: 8.0 oz/yd² (271.25 g/m²)
• Air-jet spun yarn with a soft feel and reduced pilling
• Double-lined hood with matching drawcord
• Quarter-turned body to avoid crease down the middle
• 1 × 1 athletic rib-knit cuffs and waistband with spandex
• Front pouch pocket
• Double-needle stitched collar, shoulders, armholes, cuffs, and hem
• Embroidery done right here at home, folks

Disclaimer: Due to the fabric properties, the White color variant may appear off-white rather than bright white.

This product is made especially for you as soon as you place an order, which is why it takes Liberty a bit longer to deliver it to you. Making products on demand instead of in bulk helps reduce overproduction, so thank you for making thoughtful purchasing decisions!

Looking to rep the brand on a budget?  This hoodie, with printed Liberty logos, will make you stand out as someone who knows.  For après (or avant), this stylie hoodie will complete your drip like nothing else.

----------------------------------------

Details:
• 50% pre-shrunk cotton, 50% polyester
Heather Sport Dark Navy is 40% cotton, 60% polyester
• Fabric weight: 8.0 oz/yd² (271.25 g/m²)
• Air-jet spun yarn with a soft feel and reduced pilling
• Double-lined hood with matching drawcord
• Quarter-turned body to avoid crease down the middle
• 1 × 1 athletic rib-knit cuffs and waistband with spandex
• Front pouch pocket
• Double-needle stitched collar, shoulders, armholes, cuffs, and hem
• Printed right here in the good ol' USA


Disclaimer: Due to the fabric properties, the White color variant may appear off-white rather than bright white.

This product is made especially for you as soon as you place an order, which is why it takes Liberty a bit longer to deliver it to you. Making products on demand instead of in bulk helps reduce overproduction, so thank you for making thoughtful purchasing decisions!

An all new ski enters the Helix family in a women-specific version.  We updated the tip and tail rocker so the ski butters with ease and will now ski the whole mountain much more capably.  Bamboo, poplar, and carbon fiber construction keep this ski lively and ready to rip any jump line.  The W means ‘wow.’

This is a model year 2025 Scope 94w. It is a DEMO ski - it has been used at on-snow demos. It comes with Tyrolia Attack2 11 demo bindings and brakes. There is no warranty on this item.

–

The all new Scope 94W smashes powder and crud with ease. The ski is lighter than previous models in Liberty’s women’s ski line.  Poplar and ash mixed with a phenolic plate under foot create a perfect blend of playfulness and edge hold. High-carbon race bases will keep this ski motoring on long cat tracks or places where you might need some extra juice. Our European-managed factory has set a new standard this year with this women-specific model.

 

Ski Essentials Review

"The Scope 94W is impressively light, playful, and creative—perfect for freestyle and freeride-oriented skiers. Its progressive rocker profile and positive camber underfoot deliver a unique blend of energy, stability, and responsiveness."

This is a model year 2025 Helix 89. It is a DEMO ski - it has been used at on-snow demos. It comes with Tyrolia Attack2 11 demo bindings and brakes. There is no warranty on this item.

–

The pedigree feel of the Helix 88 now lives on in the new Helix 89.  Updated and increased tip and tail rocker give this ski a super playful feel.  The midsection of the ski stays moderately stiff so high speed arcs are made with ease.  Whether you are grabbing this ski for multiple park days or just looking for a narrower, all mountain tool the Helix 89 is your wing man.
